com.illcode.meterman.event

Interface TurnListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BasicWorldManager, DarkRoom

    public interface TurnListener
    A TurnListener is notified at the end of each turn

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void turn()
      Called at the beginning of each turn, before any other processing begins, or at the end of the turn, after all other processing has finished.

    • Method Detail

      • turn

        void turn()
        Called at the beginning of each turn, before any other processing begins, or at the end of the turn, after all other processing has finished.
